/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the street, there are buildings visible, their details slightly obscured by the distance. On the left side, a sidewalk runs parallel to the street, leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene.
